---
title: "News"
format:
  html:
    grid:
      body-width: 1300px
listing:
  - id: "upcoming_event"
    image-height: 200px
    grid-columns: 3
    image-placeholder: "./img/logo.png"
    fields: [image,title, description,categories, date]
    contents: news/upcoming/*.qmd
    type: grid
    sort:
      - "date desc"
  - id: "past_event"
    fields: [title, Dates, Location, Organizers]
    field-display-names:
      title: "Event title"
    contents: news/past/*.qmd
    type: table
    sort:
      - "date desc"  
---
